content.rendered:
Let Us Show You What Happens When You Get

#BrandedByBrandemic

Brandemic’s Inception Is Still A Mystery

(Much Like The Bitcoin)

Not really, it’s just a very long story. But what we can tell you is, it’s a wild series of events that brought us here. (Hint: Our name)

We started as four college friends who wanted to do different things in life. Each of us had a different thought process and skill set, but we all had a common love for entrepreneurship and the start-up culture, and that is what brought us together.

We literally started Brandemic out of a basement with 2 laptops and a few phones. Today we are a team of almost 25+ crazy people who love their work. That’s the thing – if you aren’t a tad bit crazy, you don’t make it to Brandemic.

Not really, it’s just a very long story. But what we can tell you is, it’s a wild series of events that brought us here.
(Hint: Our name)

We started as four college friends who wanted to do different things in life. Each of us had a different thought process and skill set, but we all had a common love for entrepreneurship and the start-up culture, and that is what brought us together.

We literally started Brandemic out of a basement with 2 laptops and a few phones. Today we are a team of almost 25+ crazy people who love their work. That’s the thing – if you aren’t a tad bit crazy, you don’t make it to Brandemic.

Brandemic’s Inception
Is Still A Mystery

(Much Like The Bitcoin)

Not really, it’s just a very long story. But what we can tell you is, it’s a wild series of events that brought us here. (Hint: Our name)

We started as four college friends who wanted to do different things in life. Each of us had a different thought process and skill set, but we all had a common love for entrepreneurship and the start-up culture, and that is what brought us together.

We literally started Brandemic out of a basement with 2 laptops and a few phones. Today we are a team of almost 25+ crazy people who love their work. That’s the thing – if you aren’t a tad bit crazy, you don’t make it to Brandemic.

THE PROCESS

Where The Magic Lies,
And Happens
Every Single Time!

01

You searched for one of our services on Google and either clicked on our ad or an organic listing by the search engine. (You were searching for the best, we bet!)

02

You got an ad on Facebook, Instagram, or Youtube. (We create some kick-ass ad campaigns for ourselves and our clients.)

03

Someone who knows about Brandemic or one of our clients referred you to us. (Our clients love us but not as much as we love them.)

What Next?

Once you find us, you land on our award-winning website, see through our work, get to know us, and maybe even read this page and fill up the enquiry form.

Now, You Get A Call
From This Man

Akshay

Co-Founder at Brandemic
Ex-Foodpanda, Ex-Zomato (Sales)

Akshay tells you what Brandemic is all about, understands you, your business, and your requirements and clarifies any doubts that you might have.

PS: We do not take up every project that comes our way, we work with people and brands we vibe with. If we are not on the same page or think that we cannot add value, we do not go forward. But, if we do, then we get into the second round of discussion to understand the project scope, timelines, and budgeting.

Now, You Will Be
Introduced To One Of These People

Harsh

Co-Founder, Head Of Design
Ex-Red Baton Studios

Pranay

Co-Founder, Head Of Web
Ex–Foodpanda, Ex–Shopmatic

Right after the discussion, we send you a questionnaire for us to understand everything better. This is then forwarded to the respective team along with a brief. We allow the relevant team members to take their time to analyse, understand, and get their gears turning.

But here’s a word of caution –We might not just stick to the brief, and that’s the interesting part. 

Not An Agency,
Your Own
Goddamn Team!

Brandemic is not just an agency or a vendor. We work like your partners, your very own team. We work with a very limited set of clients so that we can give our best work. If there’s something that will never change at Brandemic – it’s our commitment to giving our best to each of our projects.

Breaking Down The Brief, Not Sticking To It

At Brandemic, we have designed a system that helps us clearly understand the client’s needs. Once we carefully analyze the brief, we ask questions, discuss possibilities, and analyze market trends, and competitors before crafting concepts.

 

Thoughtful Concepts And Not Just Options

Once we have the research in place, we build unique concepts around or beyond it. The initial drafts are always eye-openers that help you get fresh perspectives. Once we have your feedback and a discussion we then edit, rebuild, or even in some cases merge concepts to arrive at the final output.

Creative Problem Solving, and Not Just "Great Work!"

YES LET'S DO THIS

Meet The People
Who Will Be Working With You

DESIGN DIVISION

Karthik

UI/UX Lead & Senior Graphic Designer

Abhishek

Senior Graphic Designer/Video Animator

Akshita

Senior Graphic Designer

Gunjan

Senior Graphic Designer

Shruthika

Graphic Designer

WEB DIVISION

Zayn

Website & Tech Lead

Yash

Senior Website Developer

Fahad

Backend Developer

Riyaz

Backend Developer

Shreya

Website Developer

MARKETING DIVISION

Harshith

SEO Specialist

Anand

Growth Marketer

Kabir

Content Lead

Diya Varma

Creative Strategist
